name: Don't Touch Spikes
description:
Theme: Against the Rules!

WASD / Arrow Keys -> Movement
Space / Z -> Jump
Left Mouse Button [while midair] / X -> Pogo Attack 

[xbox controller supported]

***

Final project

***

Assets:

Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog
Peaberry Pixel Font by emhuo
Chunky Font by batfeula
Additional effects animations by me

***

Music:

Cooking Time by Matsu
Style by Ryo Lion
おしゃれなカフェ by Notzan Act
まったりライフ by Yoshinori Tanaka
黒ねこのボッサ by れいな
